help.short: The name of the connection monitor.
The name of the Network Watcher resource.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="endpoints">
<prop type="array" name="items">
<prop type="array<@ConnectionMonitorEndpointScopeItem_read>" name="exclude">
<prop type="array" name="include">
<prop type="array" name="outputs">
<prop type="array" name="testConfigurations">
<prop type="array" name="requestHeaders">
<prop type="array" name="validStatusCodeRanges">
<prop type="array" name="testGroups">
<prop type="array" name="destinations" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="sources" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="testConfigurations" required="True">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: The name of the connection monitor.
The name of the Network Watcher resource.

command.name: create

help.short: The name of the connection monitor.
The name of the Network Watcher resource.
Value indicating whether connection monitor V1 should be migrated to V2 format.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.endpoints" options="endpoints" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.endpoints[].filter.items" options="items">
<arg type="array<@ConnectionMonitorEndpointScopeItem_create>" var="$parameters.properties.endpoints[].scope.exclude" options="exclude">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.endpoints[].scope.include" options="include">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.outputs" options="outputs" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.testConfigurations" options="test-configurations" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.testConfigurations[].httpConfiguration.requestHeaders" options="request-headers">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.testConfigurations[].httpConfiguration.validStatusCodeRanges" options="valid-status-code-ranges">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.testGroups" options="test-groups" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.testGroups[].destinations" options="destinations" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.testGroups[].sources" options="sources" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.testGroups[].testConfigurations" options="test-configurations" required="True">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="endpoints" arg="$parameters.properties.endpoints">
<prop type="array" name="items" arg="$parameters.properties.endpoints[].filter.items">
<prop type="array<@ConnectionMonitorEndpointScopeItem_create>" name="exclude" arg="$parameters.properties.endpoints[].scope.exclude">
<prop type="array" name="include" arg="$parameters.properties.endpoints[].scope.include">
<prop type="array" name="outputs" arg="$parameters.properties.outputs">
<prop type="array" name="testConfigurations" arg="$parameters.properties.testConfigurations">
<prop type="array" name="requestHeaders" arg="$parameters.properties.testConfigurations[].httpConfiguration.requestHeaders">
<prop type="array" name="validStatusCodeRanges" arg="$parameters.properties.testConfigurations[].httpConfiguration.validStatusCodeRanges">
<prop type="array" name="testGroups" arg="$parameters.properties.testGroups">
<prop type="array" name="destinations" arg="$parameters.properties.testGroups[].destinations" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="sources" arg="$parameters.properties.testGroups[].sources" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="testConfigurations" arg="$parameters.properties.testGroups[].testConfigurations" required="True">

<prop type="array" name="endpoints">
<prop type="array" name="items">
<prop type="array<@ConnectionMonitorEndpointScopeItem_read>" name="exclude">
<prop type="array" name="include">
<prop type="array" name="outputs">
<prop type="array" name="testConfigurations">
<prop type="array" name="requestHeaders">
<prop type="array" name="validStatusCodeRanges">
<prop type="array" name="testGroups">
<prop type="array" name="destinations" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="sources" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="testConfigurations" required="True">
